extensionDescription.message: Easily convert temperatures on websites right from the Firefox context menu!

autoConvertDescription.message: Scan website for temperatures and insert the converted temperature automatically

autoConvertAdvancedDescription.message: Expand the automatic converting of temperatures to include temperatures formatted without degree symbol (e.g. "180C" or "180 c")

autoConvertAdvancedDisabledTooltip.message: Automatically convert temperatures must be allowed
